mapper.update: CREATE TABLE h_users ( app varchar2 (255) NOT NULL, username VARCHAR2 (255) NOT NULL UNIQUE, password VARCHAR2 (255) NOT NULL, role_name VARCHAR2 (255) NOT NULL, created_at NUMBER (20), updated_at NUMBER (20), primary key (app, username) )
CREATE TABLE h_roles ( app varchar2 (255) NOT NULL, name VARCHAR2 (255) NOT NULL, description VARCHAR2 (500), created_at NUMBER (20), updated_at NUMBER (20), primary key (app, name) )

CREATE TABLE h_menus ( app varchar2 (255) NOT NULL, name VARCHAR2 (255) NOT NULL, menu_desc VARCHAR2 (255), url VARCHAR2 (1024), parent_key varchar2 (255) DEFAULT '0', menu_level NUMBER (2) DEFAULT 1, order_index NUMBER (10) DEFAULT 0, icon_name varchar2 (255) DEFAULT 'LogIcon', created_at NUMBER (20), updated_at NUMBER (20), primary key (app, name) )
CREATE TABLE h_role_menus ( app varchar2 (255) NOT NULL, role_name varchar2 (255) NOT NULL, menu_name varchar2 (255) NOT NULL, primary key (app, role_name, menu_name) )
